alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 12:30AM EDT until June 15 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM EDT FOR DECATUR AND SEMINOLE COUNTIES... At 1230 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Chattahoochee, or 13 miles southwest of Bainbridge, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Donalsonville, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Attapulgus, Iron City, Brinson, Hanover, Ausmac, Reynoldsville, Recovery, Decatur Co A/P, Laingkat, Jinks, Riverturn, Sharphagen, Donaldsonville A/P, Seminole State Park, Steam Mill and Desser. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
